title: The Heroine Took The Villain Script - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Historical   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Female Protagonist   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: Selina
description:
Get you into the book and be the villain?!

He Tiantian said–

To be the villain is to be the biggest.

Take the path of the villain, leaving the villain nowhere to go!

——————

[Starting as a liar]
He Tiantian: How can you say it’s a lie? This is our emotional escort!

[The whole family is the best]
He Tiantian pouted: Who is the best? We are obviously true temperaments!

——————

Others use their whole lives to heal their childhood, but He Tiantian said: I have reached the pinnacle of life by being a villain!

(Quickly wear, there is no fixed CP, there may be a small world!)>
